thread.title: Aamir Khan buys daughter Ira's painting
thread.title_full: Aamir Khan buys daughter Ira's painting - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Aamir Khan buys daughter Ira's painting
text:
Superstar Aamir Khan's daughter Ira is holding her debut art exhibition here and the proud father managed to purchase one painting of hers.
The 50-year-old actor, who is currently prepping for his biographical sports drama "Dangal", said the black and white landscape is called "The Tiger's Nest".
Picture courtesy: Aamir Khan's Twitter account 
"My daughter Ira's first exhibition, and I managed to buy this one. It's called 'The Tiger's Nest'. I love it!," he posted on Twitter.

Aamir Khan 
Aamir has two children -- Ira and son Junaid -- with his previous wife Reena Dutta. The "PK" star is now married to filmmaker Kiran Rao and the couple are proud parents of Azad Rao Khan.
